text: Cara Fitzpatrick is an American journalist. She won a 2016 Pulitzer Prize in Local Reporting. and 2015 George Polk Award. In 2018, she was a Spencer Fellow. In 2019, she was a New Arizona Fellow. She graduated from University of Washington, and the Columbia University School of Journalism. She worked for the Tampa Bay Times. She is an editor at Chalkbeat. == References == Category:Living people Category:American journalists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:George Polk Award winners Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Cara Fitzpatrick
